title: Definitions
context: [§487D-1] Definitions. For purposes of this chapter: &ldquo;Cardholder&rdquo; means any consumer to whom a retail merchant club card is issued, and may include all persons holding the club card under the same account. &ldquo;Cardholder information&rdquo; means the cardholder&rsquo;s name, mailing address, electronic mail address, and any unique membership identifiers assigned by the club card issuer to the cardholder for purposes of targeting marketing activities. &ldquo;Club card&rdquo; means any card or device used for the purpose of obtaining access to purchase retail products through membership, for price discounts, or to receive other no-cost benefits provided by the retail merchant. A &ldquo;club card&rdquo; is not a credit card, charge card, or check cashing card. &ldquo;Club card issuer&rdquo; means a retail merchant that provides club cards to consumers, and includes a contract information services provider of the retail merchant. &ldquo;Marketing purposes&rdquo; means the categorization of cardholders based on the cardholders shopping patterns, spending history, or behavioral characteristics derived from account activity that is provided to an unaffiliated third party for consideration. &ldquo;Personal information&rdquo; means information associated with an actual person that is a name, an address, a telephone number, an electronic mail address, a driver&rsquo;s license number, a social security number, an employer, a place of employment, information related to employment, an employee identification number, a mother&rsquo;s maiden name, an identifying number of a depository account, a bank account number, a password used for accessing information, a taxpayer identification number, health insurance identification number, date of birth, a personal identification number (PIN), a government passport number, credit card number, or any other name, number, or code that is used to access personal financial information about the actual person. &ldquo;Retail merchant&rdquo; means any retailer that sells food, products, or merchandise. &ldquo;Unaffiliated third party&rdquo; means a business that is not under the corporate control or common ownership of the club card issuer or is not a contract information services provider of the retail merchant. [L 2004, c 92, pt of §2]
